trans-unit.source: Creates the theme-specific look for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: 建立佈景主題特定尋找[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `theme:` An xmlns prefix for the CLR namespace.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 物件項目用法``` ``` # # XAML 值`theme:`xmlns 前置詞CLR 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Typically, xmlns prefixes and mappings are defined in a XAML root element (not shown).
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，xmlns 前置詞和對應的定義 （未顯示） 的 XAML 根項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ScrollChrome"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ScrollChrome"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
To be added.
Gets the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ScrollGlyph"></xref> for the specified object.
The dependency object to which the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ScrollGlyph"></xref> is attached.
One of the enumeration values.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> renders with a white outer border.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>呈現具有白色的外框。

trans-unit.source: This property does not exist in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aero](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aero-md.md)] theme.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不存在於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aero](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aero-md.md)]佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> renders with a white outer border; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>呈現具有白色的外框; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ScrollChrome.HasOuterBorder*> dependency property.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that describes the amount of space between a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> and its child element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值描述之間的距離<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>及其子元素。

trans-unit.source: This property does not exist in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aero](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aero-md.md)] theme.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不存在於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aero](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aero-md.md)]佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ScrollChrome.Padding*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> appears as if the mouse is over it.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>顯示如同滑鼠是透過它。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>出現已按下。
